data.title: Best Fried Fish!
data.text: We visit Detroit every couple of years from Hawaii.  The Fish Market is a mandatory stop for us.  The fish is so fresh and cooked to perfection:  Hot and moist inside, crispy and tasty on the outside.  We have been taken to other much more expensive seafood restaurants for fish, but none are as delicious as The Fish Market.  Not only is The Fish Market more tasty, the prices are half what you'd pay at the other places.  The only problem is it really is for carry out.  There is a small eating counter inside or a single table outside, but that's it.

data.title: High Prices
data.text: I lived very close to this place, and often walked there for my fish needs. I compared their prices to other fish markets and supermarkets. Their costs were far higher here. Freshness, maybe, but my crawfish were from the same Chinese distributor, in the same package, the only difference was the 80 percent higher cost(Yes, 80 Percent) at the Fish Market. I understand that the mom and pop stores need to survive, but charging that much more was absurd.

data.title: Disappointing
data.text: The service was excellent but the fish was very average and the batter had no seasoning or taste whatsoever.

owner_response.author: Connie G, Public Relations Manager at The Fish Market, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Sorry, your meal wasn't seasoned enough, we would love for you to stop by and talk to us, and voice your concerns.  We don't know we have a problem unless someone tells us, when you come back please update your review.  Reviews help or hurt a small family business like ours.....
Thanks,
Connie Gregory
Public Relations
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Dearborn is keeping a seafood secret!
data.text: First off, this is a seafood market. It is a place to buy seafood to take home. HOWEVER....they have a menu that includes a wide variety of fish you can have fried on the spot and take to go. We tried the cod and lake perch fresh fried with a side of fries. The fries were just so-so, but the fish was so so good. The best fried fish I have ever had. Crispy and flavorful on the outside, creamy and delicious on the inside. This is truly a hidden gem. Don't expect to go and have a nice sit down elegant seafood dinner. Do expect to truly enjoy your fried fishy goodness! This is the definition of a hidden gem.
